root: ^Perfect, now that we have some snacks for the road, I’ll show you the surprise.
^Ta-da! It’s an abandoned car some humans left behind. I have the keys!
^I’ve been wanting to drive it, but it’s a two raccoon job.
^Now that I’ve got you in my life, we can do this together!
^You must not got all the corn on your cob if you think I’m getting in that thing!
^Oh, come on, Figgy! This is my dream and I can only do it if you…
^Smells like I found more road snacks!
^I can’t believe this! The humans got him, they’re gonna to eat him!
